Name: Secreted Proteins Via GO Annotation And WoLF PSORT For shCTSB Paper
Tools:
tp_cut_tool, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
get_subontology_from, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
term_id_vs_term_name, filters out all proteins in the input protein list of interest that are annotated as "extracellular region" and "lysosome" and "plasma membrane" excluding "extracellular organelle" and "cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane"
comp1, tp_sorted_uniq, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
get_subontology_from, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
get_subontology_from, bg_uniq, wolf_psort, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
term_id_vs_term_name, Extracts uniprot accessions from all proteins in the input list that are predicted by WolfPsort to be lysosomal and/or extracellular.
Convert characters1, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside in lysosomes.
Filter1, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
get_subontology_from, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
term_id_vs_term_name, uniprot, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside extracellularly.
Filter1, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
term_id_vs_term_name, Removes comment lines at the head of the Uniprot Go database file.
Grep1, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
get_subontology_from, tp_easyjoin_tool
